attributes.action: Keep the EU off our British Birth Certificates
attributes.additional_details:
As the Daily Mail reported in this article
 http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2388384/EU-flag-set-replace-royal-crest-British-birth-certificates-despite-ministers-bid-block-move.html
Please click or copy and paste to view it.

We are wanting you to take action to make sure that UK Birth certificate and other certificates stay the same and show upon them as always the royal crest and stay a British Birth Certificate. We are wanting you to revoke the new EU style certificate and keep our certificates unchanged and to make this absolute so as it can not be changed or phased in slowly as suggested by Eric Pickles, or become compulsory by the EU.
'We want you to say no to the EU certificates in all shape and form and keep our Births, Deaths and Marriage certificates unchanged'
